publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-286.1 Mr Jamie McGrigor: First Minister's Question Time and Minor Standing Order Changesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-286) in the name of Iain Smith, insert at end "but disagrees with the recommendation in paragraph 46 of the report that First Minister's Question Time should start at 12 noon and instead recommends that First Minister's Question Time starts around 2 pm." Supported by: David Mundell*, David McLetchie*, Alex Johnstone*, Murdo Fraser*, Bill Aitken*
